Author: tss_ben
Title: [ANN] ğŸ”’TOKEN SECURITY SCHEME ğŸ”‘ Making Blockchain Safer for Everyday UseğŸ”’
Body: 5M Holdings, the parent company of Token Security Scheme, is pleased to announce the newly formed strategic partnership with Taisys Technologies.  The joint agreement will see the development of a mobile hardware wallet which contains a Secure Element to protect private keys of digital assets using Taisys' patented SIMoMEÂ® Java Card SIM overlay. This exciting project will revolutionize the way users store and secure digital assets like cryptocurrencies. ğŸ”’  Taisys Technologies is participating as an exhibitor in the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona from 26 Feb - 1 Mar 2018 (https://www.mobileworldcongress.com).  Read the news here: http://www.digitaljournal.com/pr/3674477  For more information about our strategic partner, please visit: https://www.taisys.com  Get latest updates and talk to our team on TSS Telegram group: t.me/tsstoken

Author: David_5M
Title: [ANN] ğŸ”’TOKEN SECURITY SCHEME ğŸ”‘ Making Blockchain Safer for Everyday UseğŸ”’
Body: The Taisys SIMoME overlay is a patented overlay which allows you to stick a smartcard chip over an existing SIM card for our smartphone and mobile devices. The Secure Element  which resides in the smartcard chip will act as a secure enclave for the storage of our cryptocurrency private keys. An APP will be developed to securely interface with the SE and sign all transactions without the private key leaving the SE. This will turn the mobile device into a secure hardware wallet.  This is a much safer and more convenient form factor as we no longer need to carry any separate device. It all fits nicely into your smartphone and is totally out of sight of the user.  This will revolution the way we store and transfer our cryptocurrency and make the blockchain safer for everyday use!  David

Author: staykc
Title: [ANN] ğŸ”’TOKEN SECURITY SCHEME ğŸ”‘ Making Blockchain Safer for Everyday UseğŸ”’
Body: WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | MEDIUM | YOUTUBE | TELEGRAM  BOUNTY PROGRAM | SMART CONTRACT CHALLENGE   *ICO ENDED DEC 2017* PROJECT IS NOW IN PROGRESS  THANK YOU FOR THE SUPPORT AND FAITH YOU HAVE IN THE TSS PROJECT. WE HOPE THAT WE HAVE RAISED SECURITY AWARENESS IN THE BLOCKCHAIN THROUGH OUR ICO AND BOUNTY PROGRAM!  JOIN OUR TELEGRAM GROUP FOR FURTHER UPDATES ON TSS PROJECT.   ANN Translations Chinese | German | Russian | Arabic | Indonesian | Filipino Vietnamese | Hebrew | Italian | Romanian | Croatian  What is Token Security Scheme?  Token Security Scheme (TSS) aims to address the existing security gaps in the crypto-currencies eco-system and prevent attacks on any exchange or facility storing such digital assets. With a strong background in digital key management in the payment and banking industry, our team of cyber security experts plan to implement this technology and its best practices to strengthen security in the crypto-currency eco-system.  TSS plan to store crypto-assets such as usersâ€™ private keys on Distributed Hardware Security Module (DHSM) infrastructure, which will be set up within Enhanced Payment Card Industry (EPCI) security compliant facilities. These facilities are geographically dispersed in different locations and will be regularly audited by certified professionals to ensure up-to-date compliances. DHSMs will provide a safe â€˜Vaultâ€™ with proper Cryptocurrencies Key Management System (CKMS) and procedures to mitigate and minimise the risks of digital asset storage in the crypto-currencies eco-system. TSS will allow stakeholders to safeguard digital assets effectively and leave a lasting legacy for their future generations.   TSS is an initiative from 5M Holdings Pte Ltd to improve the security features in relation to the key management within the blockchain eco-system.      TSS Token Roadmap    Token Structure   Token Name: Token Security Scheme Token Code: TSS  Token type: Ethereum ERC20  Total supply: 500,000,000 TSS (No more TSS tokens will be minted in the future)  Token Swap: 100,000,000  Future Development: 275,000,000  Marketing / Bounty / Alliance: 25,000,000  Retained by company: 100,000,000   Project Updates    LISTED EXCHANGES           SOCIAL MEDIAS           Got A Question? Reach out to us at support@tsstoken.com or www.t.me/tsstoken
